dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Notice]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 29, 2005 12:27 AM
To: Copyright Compliance
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Notice]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------

4.50) id 1DEj3B-0002XO-Aa for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Fri, 25 Mar 2005
01:16:09 -0600

helo=lili.theplanet.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from

(TLSv1:EDH-RSA-DES-CBC3-SHA:168) (Exim) id 1DEj35-000HTe-EV for

boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0000_01C530E0.756EA440"

with any abuse report

Cc:         vincenzo@penzamedia.com, snakez@jbmod.com
Subject:         [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Notice

List-Id:         abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>

<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>

Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -99.7



To Whom It May Concern:



I am writing you to avail HL2World.com and the JBMod team of its rights
under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA").



Please note that the DMCA basically provides that a service provider shall
not be liable for monetary relief, injunctive or other equitable

relief, for infringement of copyright by reason of the storage at the
direction of a user of material that resides on a system or network

controlled or operated by or for the service provider, if the service
provider: (i) does not know of the infringing activity, (ii) does not

receive a financial benefit from the infringing activity if the provider has
right and ability to control the infringing activity,

(iii) upon receiving notification of claimed infringement, the provider
expeditiously takes down or blocks access to the material,

and (iv) designates an agent to receive notification of claimed
infringement. Failure to follow the DMCA provisions may result in the

service provider incurring substantial liability for copyright infringement.



This letter is a Notice of Infringement as authorized in
